title: Permabanned, any thoughts? ^^
body:
So to start it off with, I got permabanned from League of Legends for being simply put, a toxic piece of shit. So let's check out how Riot's support tickets work in order to SUPPORT the player. I wrote KYS which I meant as ''Keep your salt/Keep your saltiness'' But Riot won't look in the game to see that it's taken out of context and just permabanned me.

Heres the conversation after I got in touch with a support ''Specialist'' I hid the name since yeah why not.
To make things easier I just write 1 for the supporter and 2 for me.

1) https://gyazo.com/5cda8a72cd936a860d56c4b04aa7980a 
2) https://gyazo.com/20c566016593f94a60ae3ba12dc8dfc4 
1) https://gyazo.com/f7a4cd58e494301ccb35c1a3ca673d1a 
2) https://gyazo.com/3a812092e90feec7bba9e01b04089330 
1) https://gyazo.com/ece4b61270dd0c5cf663f80056ae9d15 
2) https://gyazo.com/6be1d979f590bbe7419e694ec829b06c (Pardon my english here, had class)
1) https://gyazo.com/0df61aafa6fa3e2949ec704a96e196bf

After that, the supporter ended the conversation. Is this called fairness? I haven't been doing any real flaming since then, but I've used the term ''Kys'' in a lot of games to toxic people but this is the first time I got punished for it? So I just kept writing it to toxic people and I didn't see any people being mad at me for writing it so I really thought people knew it was ''Keep your saltiness'' But oh boy was I wrong. After a flamer kept on raging at our team for all reasons possible this is how the chat looked from MY writing perspective only.
Chatlog:
EasyDieEasyPie: u ok?
EasyDieEasyPie: report urgot
EasyDieEasyPie: rank kata?
EasyDieEasyPie: kys
EasyDieEasyPie: kys
EasyDieEasyPie: kys
EasyDieEasyPie: kys
EasyDieEasyPie: kys
EasyDieEasyPie: kys
EasyDieEasyPie: ask yourself
EasyDieEasyPie: didnt see
EasyDieEasyPie: ;)
EasyDieEasyPie: didnt see
EasyDieEasyPie: np
EasyDieEasyPie: UrTrash
EasyDieEasyPie: Ur trash
EasyDieEasyPie: urgot saved zilean
EasyDieEasyPie: report
EasyDieEasyPie: ll
EasyDieEasyPie: Kat you fed me like hell why talk
EasyDieEasyPie: I hit 100% Q's on you
EasyDieEasyPie: lul
EasyDieEasyPie: xd
EasyDieEasyPie: Oh yea I still hit 100% hooks
EasyDieEasyPie: 5-13
EasyDieEasyPie: If I played a one of my mains I would prob be done winning already
EasyDieEasyPie: I gave you a chanc e
EasyDieEasyPie: and took blitz
EasyDieEasyPie: see your adc
EasyDieEasyPie: see our adc
EasyDieEasyPie: does not make her build shit
EasyDieEasyPie: kata you are bad
EasyDieEasyPie: idk if you dont know it
EasyDieEasyPie: 15 deaths and a dream
EasyDieEasyPie: Kata whats your rank? Silver 1?
EasyDieEasyPie: 18 deaths and a dream

So the most toxic thing in this game would be when I said Kata was really bad but is that considered flaming? I guess I take the chat log from the start. First few mins of the game Urgot got mad at our jungler, where I asked if he was okay, he began to flame on me as well and I said report urgot. The game went on for like 10 mins. I then asked Katarina's rank, cause she was feeding/having a bad game. Urgot then bursts out into flames when he got ganked by their jungler, and every time he wrote something I replied with ''Keep your saltiness'' This kept going for good 5 mins. He then asked why I was so bad so I replied with ask yourself. Then Urgot got ganked close to my lane (I played mid lane) He asked me why I was blind and spammed pings in my face. The last really toxic thing was when I wrote ''UrTrash/Ur Trash'' This began when Urgot wrote ''Bitchcrank'' to me, so I wrote ''UrTrash'' The rest is kinda kata flaming her own team when she is like 3-18 or something close to that.

So, in all fairness, is this enough for a permaban or wouldn't a warning be enough? If I got a warning that the word ''Kys'' is not acceptable by any means I would never have used the shortened sentence? Wouldn't it be better as they say to ''Educate'' players as they call it when they permaban people? Why wouldn't they listen to me at all, is it because you can't get a wrongful permaban revoked? (Maybe not a wrong mute idk how toxic you need to be for that?) Whats your thoughts on it? Oh and if you are wondering if the other flamers in that game got banned, I can tell you nope they did not.

The game stats:
https://gyazo.com/6eb0f2bb407e38844fd6c0cc3718d900

So the open question for all forums readers, is it fair to get banned for a word you used out of context and because of a misunderstanding? I do not really wan't to ''Cheese'' it and say anything thats not important like my hours, money spent bla bla. But any thoughts? What would you do if you had this problem?

replies.body:
You know damn well what you used it to mean.

It is not bad customer support to leave you banned. In fact, it’s great customer support towards the rest of us.

A quick google search reveals basically NOTHING gaming related about the search term "Keep your salt." You may personally use it that way, but that's kind of like saying "I use this piece of hate speech to mean *I think you are an exceptional person and I'd like to give you a big hug*" -- i.e. not an acceptable usage.

Can I ask where this term came from? Given that I can't find ANY information on that context for this abbreviation other than this thread, it seems a bit unbelievable to thing that you'd somehow expect someone to know what that abbreviation means. Sort of like if I assumed people would know USA stands for Umbrella Science Association.
Kys -> Keep your saltiness I used it in OverWatch and on facebook in group chats.

If I just start saying the n word and claim it’s a term of endearment for homosexuals, would it be acceptable?

No. You don’t get to redefine shit, especially when it’s obvious you’re full of bullshit.

> [{quoted}](name=EasyDieEasyPie,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBhH3pxT,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-09-01T16:46:19.072+0000)
>
> Kys -> Keep your saltiness I used it in OverWatch and on facebook in group chats.

Sure. Let's say that's true: given that no one ELSE uses that abbreviation to mean that (seriously: I could find it ANYWHERE), why would you even type it to other people?
If you checked the chat you would understand that I had no need to type kill yourself to the person

> [{quoted}](name=EasyDieEasyPie,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBhH3pxT,comment-id=0005000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-01T17:12:29.204+0000)
>
> If you checked the chat you would understand that I had no need to type kill yourself to the person

There would be no reason to type keep your salt at that point either, given the log provided. So you'll have to excuse me if I don't believe you have put up a very good argument for why we should believe you used this particular abbreviation to mean something highly unusual.
You would need the chat log to understand it :) Go and get it and you will understand

Nobody in this world ever is going to believe you.

Even with that being said, unless you have been living under a rock, you KNOW what that term actually means, which means you have been deliberatedly ignoring it while claiming to be saying something else.

And even without spouting these terms, you are extremely antagonistic towards the other players, so there's that.

I don't really get why people even discuss with this guy about "how do you think kys mean this or that".

He dont. It's very common that children like to go back and try to convince people they didn't said this or that.

Also just a children would not realize that your meaning to a word have 0 importance over the meaning to other people. Anyone can google kys and know what this means to everyone.

Bottom line is that people waste too much time talking about that kid clearly shitty excuse to wish people to kill themselves.
Thoughts? You deserve the ban, I am glad you are banned, your excuse is laughable and unoriginal.

1st of all before we read any further. stop lying to everyone. no one says "kys" as keep your salt, and you know this.

The way you said you used it wouldn't even work  with what you said as an entirety.
I have always been saying that so stop lying yourself :)

How is he lying-

Ah. I get it. Troll thread.
Keep your salt? Really? Come on man.

Oh look, half a dozen lines of KYS

Ban deserved
You know what you did, own up to it.

> I got permabanned from League of Legends for being simply put, a toxic piece of shit.

I don't see a problem.

>I wrote KYS which I meant as ''Keep your salt/Keep your saltiness'' But Riot won't look in the game to see that it's taken out of context and just permabanned me.

You see it that way, Others don't.

>Is this called fairness?

Yes.

>I've used the term ''Kys'' in a lot of games to toxic people but this is the first time I got punished for it?

Why wouldn't you get punished for it?

>So I just kept writing it to toxic people and I didn't see any people being mad at me for writing it so I really thought people knew it was ''Keep your saltiness'' But oh boy was I wrong.

Don't lie. Everyone knows it means "kill yourself" not "keep your saltiness"
Who told you it means that?

>After a flamer kept on raging at our team for all reasons possible this is how the chat looked from MY writing perspective only.

Because everyone's for themselves. Others behaving incorrectly doesn't give you a free pass to do whatever you want.

>So the most toxic thing in this game would be when I said Kata was really bad but is that considered flaming?

100% Yes. I'd mute you since the 2nd msg where you asked for reports on urgot if I were with you in a game.

>So, in all fairness, is this enough for a permaban or wouldn't a warning be enough? 

I'd say it's fair enough for a permaban. If not then a warning, a 14-day ban one.

>Whats your thoughts on it?

Deserved.
"KYS" is a bannable offense.
You wrote kys thats an instant ban if you get reported i just experienced that 2 weeks ago just got unbanned today

Since all the 10-year-olds found the post and are busy taking down a banned person so they can feel better, the question is not if I should be unbanned or not I could care less since Riot support is trash, and if you get banned it's too bad whatever you do you will not be unbanned. 
The real question is this:

So the open question for all forums readers, is it fair to get banned for a word you used out of context and because of a misunderstanding? I do not really want to ''Cheese'' it and say anything that's not important like my hours, money spent bla bla. But any thoughts? What would you do if you had this problem?

I know its funny cause you aren't banned but I hope for all of you who thinks it's impossible that this is what happened, that you have fun if it happens to you.

I’m definitely not 10. Actually working on my doctorate right now.

It is fair, as there is not another meaning like you’re trying to claim to get out of this mess.

It won’t happen to me, as I don’t tell strangers on the internet to kill themselves.

>So the open question for all forums readers, is it fair to get banned for a word you used out of context and because of a misunderstanding?    

Yes, that is like spamming F!# and saying it means a a cigarette, how could anyone construe it as homophobic??? "KYS" has one, fairly well known meaning, particularly when spammed in league at someone you don't like. Using an obscure, made-up or otherwise uncommon definition does not give you a free pass to use otherwise prohibited language.

Saying it once is one thing in itself.  6 times in succession and anyone can tell you're full of it. And it's not just that. You spend a hefty amount of that log belittling others and being outright negative and condescending of your team. 

Doesn't matter how you defend yourself.  You're responsible for your actions and your past punishments should have been the wake up call for you. You call everyone who's replied so far 10-year olds but you're the only one acting like it with not understanding your own behavior was wrong.

I'm not even 10 years old. Im over with it. I am mature always.

Edit: going to school as always
I love how you people know nothing but meh

> [{quoted}](name=EasyDieEasyPie,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bBhH3pxT,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-09-01T16:16:23.385+0000)
>
> I love how you people know nothing but meh

The thing is that you are using your 12 year old logic on the community and riot side really expecting it's going to achieve you something.

See how well it's working for you? You got your account permanent banned.
We all can play and you can't. How cool is that?

You look through the stream of other threads who complain over their bans and restrictions about what **they** say and the responses that come with it and maybe you'll understand that what your actions were led to said deserved punishment
